snippet.title: Deep Rock Galactic: Season 01 - Narrated Trailer
snippet.description:
Hello, Miners!

We're proud to announce our biggest update thus far - Season 01: Rival Incursion. Yes, that's right, we are, for now, moving to do themed Seasons instead of just Updates. Season 01 includes four new primary weapons, a new challenging boss-fight mission, and we're introducing a major new addition to the game: the Performance Pass - our take on a 100% FREE Battle Pass.

For us here at Ghost Ship, this feels like a significant moment, almost akin to how we felt launching into 1.0 last year. To celebrate this and to showcase all the cool new features and concepts, we've put together this 6 minutes long trailer narrated by Mission Control himself.

SEASON 01 AND THE PERFORMANCE PASS
The addition of the Performance Pass is to offer a regular cadence of cosmetics that are accessible to both new and long-standing players, as well as expand on the reasons to keep on mining - we gotta meet those quotas, Miners!

The Performance Pass contains 100 levels of free unlocks for you to pursue - from tokens called Scrips that allow you to pick and choose from a Cosmetic Tree, to satchels of Credits and crafting materials, to brand-new Victory Moves, and even a FULL set of new Weapon Frameworks for every gun in the game - including the four new ones.

RIVAL TECH DLC
To go along with Season 01, there is of course also a tasty new cosmetic DLC Pack. The RIVAL TECH PACK will let you deck out your guns even further in style - this time themed to go with the all-new enemy faction introduced with the Update. 
Go have a look https://youtu.be/n4I_eS1_du0

GOT QUESTIONS?
We've also put together a comprehensive FAQ regarding Season 01, which you can read here: https://www.deeprockgalactic.com/season01-faq.

Season 01: RIVAL INCURSION - will release on Steam November 4th 2021, and on Xbox/GamePass on November 18th 2021.

With love
Ghost Ship Games

--------------------
DEEP ROCK GALACTIC is a co-op-first sci-fi FPS featuring badass space Dwarves, 100% destructible environments, procedurally-generated caves, and endless hordes of alien monsters.

--------------------
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/548430
Microsoft Store: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productId/9NHFVWX1V7QJ

--------------------
Find out more:
http://www.deeprockgalactic.com/

Follow Deep Rock Galactic:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/joindeeprock/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/joindeeprock/
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/DeepRockGalactic
Discord:  https://www.discord.gg/drg
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/ghostship_games
